    • apply

      public MenuBuilder apply(Consumer<Menu> func)
      Applies a function to the Menu instance currently being built. Most operations on the instance can be performed using this method.

      Example usage:

      
 apply(menu -> menu.setId("Main" + menu.getTypeSelector()))
      Returns:
      builder instance
